tvdb: Lucy doesn't know how to deal with Ian's admission of love, but he still wants to be friends. After Livvie returns from dragging away Tess in a trunk, Lucy & Ian ask why she's filthy. Livvie claims she fell on the way to make peace with Tess. Alison's trapped on a flight with Elizabeth & Stephen due to bad weather. Rafe calls Ali but when Stephen answers, Rafe threatens to kill him if he hurts Ali. Ali learns Rafe & Jack are in jail and demands Stephen drop the charges and he does. Ali's flight experiences turbulence and Rafe learns the jet fell off the radar. On land, Stephen lays Elizabeth down, then checks on Ali.
